messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] teach with movies
messages.msgSnippet: I have always found that the best way to introduce new ideas and topics of conversation is to pick up on something we ve seen on TV and movies. ... From:
messages.messageBody:
I have always found that the best way to introduce new ideas and topics of
conversation is to pick up on something we've seen on TV and movies.


----Original Message Follows----
From: adarl52357@...
Reply-To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] teach with movies
Date: Sun, 18 Feb 2001 23:31:19 EST

I just found this great website. I wanted to look up Civil War movies and
find out how historically accurate they are. I got that info and more:
http://www.teachwithmovies.org/
